website_summaries.verdict: Retro shoes that go with the latest trends of athletic shoes with a nostalgic touch.
pros: The shoe is true to size and it is comfortable due to breathable fabrics in the shoe
cons: The back of the shoe can be painful on the ankle

customer_reviews.title: Blue shoes anyone?
customer_reviews.text: Very nice solid support shoe for anyone needing stability . My cerebral palsy daughter has poor balance and can navigate well in these since there is no memory foam involved to cause her problems.
customer_reviews.author: zippy

customer_reviews.title: Hot pink Reebok
customer_reviews.text: The color is perfect and their very soft would definitely purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Hollie

customer_reviews.title: Color is a bit DIfferent
customer_reviews.text: The color is hard to match. The fit is good and the style is great. The color is just a little off from most every pink I can find.
customer_reviews.author: Seneca

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit. be warned - they are very bright ...
customer_reviews.text: perfect fit. be warned - they are very bright pink but in this case that is what we wanted. definitely buying more colors soon.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Mc

customer_reviews.title: Love these sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and bright. I've received compliments on them already. They're comfortable and easy to wear.
customer_reviews.author: wylona

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SHOE!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice color! Needs a bit more cushioning under the feet but otherwise reebok Is a GREAT BRAND! Love the style and very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Glasgow

customer_reviews.title: You will love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Well made and a good deal. Color is even more vibrant in real life. Photo doesn't so it justice
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: I like them!
customer_reviews.text: Still have them. Comfy and true to size. The color is not too bright, so they won't be the center of attention like most colorful sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: Little Bean

customer_reviews.title: perfect to wear for casual looks
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute and comfy, perfect to wear for casual looks!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Cheap feeling flimsy shoe
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t keep them. They don’t have enough room even without the insoles to accommodate my custom orthotics. I thought the shoe was rather flimsy feeling, not much cushioning or support. And they are a canvas fabric rather than a nylon. I was very disappointed. I guess I’ll stick with my basic Princess Classic Reebok’s.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Winkler

customer_reviews.title: Buy these
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected I’ll be laying them out for the “first day out of quarantine “ outfit .
customer_reviews.author: Dbo

customer_reviews.title: Though I love these tennis shoes
customer_reviews.text: Though I love these tennis shoes, they run small and narrow. The color though was exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: S.O.

customer_reviews.title: Feel good shoes!!!
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are great! The feel good I'm my feet. Very comfortable!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are so beautiful! They are more of a grey light blue ...
customer_reviews.text: These are so beautiful! They are more of a grey light blue color than just grey. So comfortable. These are my favorite tennis shoe.
customer_reviews.author: HelloEhya

customer_reviews.title: they're comfortable while walking or just standing around
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves them, fits perfectly, they're comfortable while walking or just standing around. good job Amazon humans.
customer_reviews.author: Nieciway

customer_reviews.title: Sooo comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! They are super comfortable. I'm thinking of ordering a second pair in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: SSWstar

customer_reviews.title: price!!
customer_reviews.text: absolutely love the sneakers! Another website I frequently buy products from currently sells for $103. Glad I found the same pair for a much better price. Color is goegous.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Loved the fit and color
customer_reviews.text: Loved the fit and color, however the mesh material has already started to rip. I have only worn these shoes once and, after five hours was not expecting that wear and tear so quickly.😕
customer_reviews.author: Felicia Carrillo

product_meta.title: Reebok Women's Classic Nylon Running Shoe
product_meta.description:
No need to flex, your look speaks for itself. You rock sneakers that never go out of style, and these Reebok classics have been a closet essential since their creation. This canvas kick keeps comfort and breathability in balance, while bold colors add the finishing touch to any outfit.

Reebok was founded for one of the best reasons possible: athletes wanted to run faster. So in the 1890s, Joseph William Foster made some of the first known running shoes with spikes in them. By 1895, he was in business making shoes by hand for top runners; and before long his fledgling company, J.W. Foster and Sons, developed an international clientele of distinguished athletes.
feature_bullets: Shaft measures approximately low-top from arch
